name: -webkit-column-rule-color
description: Specifies the color of the column rule.
longDescription: Changes to this property can be animated.

values.currentcolor: The value of the element's color property.
values.-webkit-activelink: The default color of a hyperlink that is being clicked.
values.-webkit-focus-ring-color: The color that surrounds a UI element, such as a text field, that has focus.
values.-webkit-link: The default color of a hyperlink that has been visited.
